As Lantern users continue to grow, costs:
As Lantern users continue to grow, costs of maintaining it increase significantly each month. In order to stick around and keep building and innovating for our users, we need to support our operations by charging a small fee for unlimited service.

To keep our free version running, we implemented a bandwidth limitation of 500 MB/ month. When the bandwidth limit is reached, the connection is slowed down and Free users are prompted to upgrade to Lantern Pro.

Lantern Pro gives you all the features o: Lantern Pro vous offre toutes les fonctions de notre version gratuite et plus encore :
Lantern Pro gives you the fastest connec: Lantern Pro vous donne la connexion la plus rapide à l'Internet ouvert en utilisant des serveurs optimisés qui sont moins achalandés que nos serveurs gratuits afin de vous offrir la meilleure vitesse possible.
Lantern Pro provides you with unlimited: Lantern Pro provides you with unlimited data to browse the web, stream videos and download content so that you will always have a fast unblocked connection. You can access all of your online content and information whenever needed.
Lantern encrypts all of your traffic to: Lantern chiffre tout votre trafic vers des sites et des services bloqués afin de protéger vos données et vos renseignements personnels.

Lantern is a software application for de: Lantern est une application pour ordinateur et mobile qui offre un accès rapide, fiable et sûr vers les sites Web et applis bloqués.
Lantern is designed to provide you with: Lantern is designed to provide you with fast unfettered access to information online. Lantern is secure and encrypts your connection to blocked sites, but it is not an anonymity tool, so if you need or would like to be anonymous online, please use Tor. Otherwise, Lantern will give you faster access to blocked sites.
Lantern is easy to use, just download an: Lantern est facile à utiliser. Il suffit de la télécharger et de l'installer pour commencer à diffuser en continu, à naviguer et à utiliser des applis. Aucune configuration n'est nécessaire.
Lantern is unique because it uses the fa: Lantern is unique because it uses the fastest geo-optimized servers, and only proxies blocked sites, to maximize your browsing speed, letting you stream HD videos instantaneously. Lantern gives you uninterrupted access to the open internet by utilizing a variety of techniques to bypass censorship and firewalls, quickly shifting to other approaches if those techniques are blocked. The developer team at Lantern is constantly adapting and revising our censorship circumvention techniques depending on the blocking environment. User feedback is integral to Lantern, with new releases incorporating suggestions and addressing concerns.
Lantern uses a variety of techniques to: Lantern utilise diverses techniques pour contourner la censure et les pare-feu afin que vous puissiez continuer à surfer avec un accès ininterrompu.
Lantern uses geo-optimized servers, and: Lantern uses geo-optimized servers, and only proxies blocked sites, to maximize browsing speed, letting you stream 1080P YouTube instantaneously.
Lantern uses geo-optimized servers, and only proxies blocked sites, to maximize browsing speed, letting you stream HD videos instantaneously.
Once you download and install Lantern, t: Once you download and install Lantern, the Lantern icon will appear in the system tray on the lower right of your screen, on Windows, and in the menu bar at the top of your screen on macOS. As long as the icon is is there, it means Lantern is running and that you can access blocked sites in any browser automatically. If you ever wish to stop Lantern, you can do so in the menu that appears when you click on the Lantern icon in the system tray or menu bar.
The payment feature makes Lantern more b: La fonction de paiement augmente la résistance aux blocages de Lantern, car les censeurs ne peuvent ni infiltrer ni bloquer Lantern sans devoir payer, ce qui apporte plus de stabilité à nos utilisateurs Pro. Nous avons offert Lantern Pro à un prix compétitif afin de nous permettre de perdurer et de continuer à fournir la façon de vous mettre en ligne la plus rapide et résistant le plus aux blocages.

With a Pro account, you can use Lantern: Avec un compte Pro, vous pouvez utiliser Lantern Pro sur trois appareils et profiter des avantages de Lantern Pro sur votre ordinateur et sur vos appareils mobiles.
With servers distributed globally, Lante: With servers distributed globally, Lantern Pro’s dynamic server allocation is constantly looking to connect you to the best performing server ensuring a smooth and uninterrupted connection. If one server is not performing, the user is transferred to another, ensuring steady connection. This allows for improved defense against censor interference with your connection. The Lantern dev team works on a 24 hour schedule to be able to identify blocking techniques by censors and respond quickly to ensure that any users experiencing blocking are online as soon as possible
